metadata.title: CVE-2024-5700 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Memory safety bugs present in Firefox 126, Firefox ESR 115.11, andThunderbird 115.11. Some of these bugs showed evidence of memory corruptionand we presume that with enough effort some of these could have beenexploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 127and Firefox ESR < 115.12.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
